name: In The Hall Of Faces By Obama
name_original: In The Hall Of Faces By Obama
description:
My First Ever Game On Unity - Mostly Tried To Get Used To The Editor Which Is Why It Kinda Bad Lol :)

Obama is here.

He will find you.

He will make you suffer.

He has sent you to the hall of faces, made by himself. Good luck surviving.

#horror #action #survival #shooter #strategy #obama #bad #meme
